CustomField.formula: CASE(MOD(Qualified_Pipeline_AR_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 6), 7), 0, Qualified_Pipeline_AR_Date__c + 0, 1, Qualified_Pipeline_AR_Date__c + 6, 2, Qualified_Pipeline_AR_Date__c + 5, 3, Qualified_Pipeline_AR_Date__c + 4, 4, Qualified_Pipeline_AR_Date__c + 3, 5, Qualified_Pipeline_AR_Date__c + 2, 6, Qualified_Pipeline_AR_Date__c + 1, NULL)
CustomField.label: Qualified Pipeline AR Week
